biotools.summary: MESBL GC-MS metabolite peak database is a standardized library of more than 900 metabolite peaks from MS-reconstructed gas chromatograms integrating the in-house standard compound and peak library of the FORTH/ICE-HT Metabolic Engineering and Systems Laboratory, appropriately filtered GOLM database peak information and Human Metabolome database information.

bioschemas.name: M-IOLITE
